Title: arrayFill(func, arr1, ...)
Description: Scan through arr1 from the first element to the last element and replace arr1[i] by arr1[i - 1] if func(arr1[i], ..., arrN[i]) returns 0. The first element of arr1 will not be replaced.
Examples: SELECT arrayFill(x -> not isNull(x), [1, null, 3, 11, 12, null, null, 5, 6, 14, null, null]) AS res
